Cell.Data: Perform a basic attack with your equipped weapon.
用你装备的武器进行基础攻击。
You raise in the air and fall down on your enemies in a powerful blast that may stun them.
跳向空中然后重重落下，释放强烈的冲击波并眩晕敌人。
Conjures explosions from the ground in a forward line, dealing Damage to nearby enemies.
在你的前方一条直线上制造连续的爆炸，对附近敌人造成伤害。
You merge with the Shadows and successively strike nearby enemies while preventing Damage.
与暗影融合连续攻击附近的敌人并免疫伤害。
Throws a powerful Fire projectile in front of you that explode when hitting an enemy.
向前方投掷一个大而有力的火焰弹，当击中敌人时产生爆炸。
Conjures a Snow Storm that may damage and slow down enemies in the area.
召唤暴风雪，对目标范围内的敌人造成伤害并减速。
Calls down an exploding Meteor that may stun targeted enemies.
召唤一颗陨石，造成爆炸并有几率眩晕目标。
Casts multiple Umbral Rays towards nearby enemies. This Spell works only if targets are present.
向附近的敌人释放多重暗影射线。必须有目标才能释放。
Casts Lightnings from your hands that deal continuous Damage to your target and have a chance to shock.
从手中释放闪电，对目标造成持续伤害，并有几率震慑敌人。
Casts down Fire projectiles in the area surrounding you that inflict Damage to your enemies.
在周围召唤火焰之雨对敌人造成伤害。
You take the form of a moving pool of Blood, inflicting Bleeding Damage to enemies nearby while preventing incoming attacks.
变成可移动的血池，对附近的敌人造成流血伤害，避免自身受到攻击。
Enrage all enemies surrounding you, causing them to attack each other.
激怒包围你的敌人，致使它们互相攻击。
Violently slams the ground, stunning nearby enemies in a large radius.
猛烈的踩踏地面，眩晕附近大范围的敌人。
You enter a Combat Frenzy, preventing part of incoming damage and generating more Rage on hits
进入战斗狂暴状态，免疫部分伤害，攻击时会增加更多的怒气。
Summons a Stone Shield that protects you from incoming attacks.
召唤一个岩石屏障来阻挡攻击。
Summons an Umbral Shield that absorbs a limited amount of Damage and deflects projectiles.
召唤一个本影护盾，吸收有限的伤害并弹开抛射物。
Performs a powerful Melee Combo with your Shield and equipped weapon.
用盾牌和武器造成有力的近战连击。
Performs a long Melee Combo with your equipped weapon.
使用武器进行近战连击。
Performs numerous attacks with your equipped weapons. Deals reduced damage per hit.
用武器进行大量的攻击。击打伤害依次递减。
Performs slow and wide-ranged thrusts with your equipped Greatsword.
用你的巨剑进行依次缓慢但大范围的猛击。
Performs very slow but powerful attacks with your Warhammer.
用你的战锤进行依次缓慢但是强力的攻击。
Performs wide-ranged cleaving attacks with your Battleaxe.
用你的战斧进行依次大范围的顺劈斩。
Performs a very quick assault with your Dual Daggers.
用的双匕首进行一次非常快速的突袭。
Grants Fire Damage to your Ranged shots and inflicts Burning effect.
给武器提供火焰伤害并造成燃烧效果。
Grants Frost Damage to your Ranged shots and may freeze you targets.
给武器提供冰霜伤害并有几率冻结敌人。
Grants Lightning Damage to your Ranged shots and may Shock them.
给武器提供闪电伤害并有几率震慑敌人。
All your Ranged shots become Explosive.
所有的远程攻击都会造成爆炸。
Grants a Physical Impulse to your Ranged shots.
给武器提供一次充能攻击。
Grants Poison Damage to your Ranged shots. Causes a Poison Nova when combined with Explosive Ammunition.
给武器提供毒素伤害。和爆炸弹药混合时引发剧毒新星。
Your Ranged shots inflict Open Wounds to targets.
你的远程射击对目标造成创伤。
Quickly shoots several projectiles in a straight line with your equipped weapon.
用你的武器多次在一条直线上射击。
Shoots multiples projectiles at the same time with your equipped weapon within a wide forward angle.
用你的武器向前方大范围同时射出多发弹药。
Swings your weapon in a powerful circular motion, striking enemies around you while moving and inflicting Damage depending on your equipped Weapons.
猛烈地旋转你的武器，可在移动时击打周围的敌人，伤害由装备的武器决定。
A violent Melee attack that deals Physical Damage to nearby enemies depending on the Damage dealt by your equipped Weapons.
进行一次重击并有几率击退敌人，由装备的武器决定造成的物理伤害。
Plants an Umbral trap on the ground that explodes after a short delay, inflicting severe Damage to enemies caught in the blast.
在地上放置一个本影炸弹，一小段延迟后爆炸，对爆炸范围内的敌人造成严重伤害。
A medium-ranged Nova that freezes nearby enemies.
释放一次小范围的新星冻结附近的敌人。
Uses the power of a mage staff to unleash Fire spells at the enemy
使用法杖中的能量向敌人释放火焰法术
Uses the power of a mage staff to unleash Frost spells at the enemy
使用法杖中的能量向敌人施放冰霜魔法
Uses the power of a mage staff to unleash Lightning spells at the enemy
使用法杖中的能量向敌人释放闪电法术
Uses the power of a mage staff to unleash Umbra spells at the enemy
使用法杖中的能量向敌人释放本影法术
Casts down several arrows that hit all enemies in a remote area, inflicting Damage depending on your equipped Weapons. The falling arrows are affected by ammunition skills.
射出多支箭矢，能击中远处范围内的所有敌人，伤害取决于你装备的武器。落下的箭矢受弹药技能的影响。
Launches a knife forward that inflict Damage to a single enemy and have high Critical Chance.
向前发出飞刀，对单个敌人造成伤害，有很高的暴击几率。
Instantly expulses all enemies in front of you and knock them down.
瞬间推开你面前的所有敌人，并将他们击倒。
A wide Slash that deals Damage and inflict Open Wounds to all nearby enemies depending on the Damage dealt by your equipped Weapons.
大范围的劈砍，造成伤害，并对所有附近的敌人造成创伤，造成的伤害取决于你装备的武器。
You summon Undead allies during a short moment who follow you and attack nearby enemies.
短时间内召唤亡灵盟友，跟随你并攻击附近的敌人。
The explosion radius of your Brutal Strike is increased.
你的残酷打击的爆炸半径增加。
Hitting enemies with your Brutal Strike may knock them down.
你的残酷打可能会击倒敌人。
You Brutal Strike inflicts more Damage.
你的残酷打击造成更多的伤害。
You automatically perform an other Brutal Strike when killing an enemy with it.
当你用残酷打击杀死敌人时，会自动发动另一次残酷攻击。
Your Whirlwind hits enemies much faster
你的旋风可以快速打击敌人
All your Resistances are increased while you keep hitting enemies with the Whirlwind.
当你用旋风攻击敌人是，你的所有的抗性都会增加。
Your move speed is increased while you keep hitting enemies with the Whirlwind.
你在用残酷打击打击敌人时，移动速度会增加。
The Arrows Rain has a wider area of effect.
The Arrows Rain inflicts more Damage.
The Rapid Shot fires one additional projectile.
快速射击射出一个额外的飞弹。
The Spread Shot inflicts more Damage.
扩散射击造成更多伤害。
You shoot two more projectiles, resulting in a wider spread.
你射出两个额外的飞弹，使得扩散的范围更广。
Reduces the dispersion of the projectiles, increasing the precision of the Shot.
减少射弹的分散程度，提高射击的精度。
你发射一个额外的火球。
The Lightning Strike deals Damage much faster.
闪电攻击更快地造成伤害。
Your Lightning Strike jumps one extra time to another enemy.
你的闪电将额外弹射到一个敌人身上。
Killing an enemy with the Lightning Strike will trigger a Lightning Explosion.
用闪电击杀敌人将触发闪电爆炸。
The Freeze effect on enemies lasts longer.
对敌人的冻结效果持续时间更长。
Hitting enemies with the Nova will regenerate a small amount of Umbra.
用新星中敌人会回复少量的本影。
The Nova has a wider range of effect.
Hitting enemies with the Tremor may knock them down.
用震颤击中敌人可能会击倒他们。
The Tremor has a wider range of effect.
The Tremor now inflicts Physical Damage on top of its Stun effect.
震颤除了击晕效果之外还会造成物理伤害。
The Seismic Rift triggers a higher number of explosions, thus reaching further enemies.
地震裂缝触发更多的爆炸，从而能攻击到更远处的敌人。
Hitting enemies with the Seismic Rift may stun them.
使用地震裂缝打击敌人可能会使他们晕眩。
Successively increases the Seismic Rift's Damage for each explosion.
每次爆炸都会增加地震裂缝的伤害。
The Seismic Rift now triggers 3 shorter lines instead of one.
地震裂缝现在触发3条短线而不是一条。
The Fire Rain launches more projectiles, thus lasting longer.
火雨将发射更多的飞弹，因此持续更久。
The Fire Rain will follow you when you are moving.
当你移动时，火雨会跟随你。
The delay between each projectile is reduced, thus reducing the duration of the Fire Rain and its missing rate.
每个投射物之间的时间间隔减少，从而减少火雨的持续时间和其失误率。
The projectiles fall to the ground much faster.
投射物下落的速度会大大加快。
Decreases the Fire Rain radius and launches additional projectiles.
减少火雨半径并发射额外的飞弹。
The Laceration has a wider range of effect.
Enemies hit by the Laceration will bleed for a longer time.
撕裂命中的敌人会流血更长的时间。
The Bleeding effect of the Laceration deals more Damage.
撕裂的流血效果造成更多的伤害。
Damage bonus for each successively hit target : %1
每个连续命中的目标的伤害加成：%1
Number of summoned creatures is increased by %1
Maximum number of simultaneous summons is increased by %1
同时召唤的最大数量增加%1
Angle between projectiles is increased by %1
投射物之间的角度增加%1
Angle between projectiles is reduced by %1
投射物之间的角度减少%1
